document.full_text: a jamaican financier who ran a ponzi scheme that defrauded thousands of investors in florida and the caribbean out of more than $220 million pleaded guilty on tuesday to fraud and money laundering charges in a u.s. court.
document.title: caribbean ponzi schemer pleads guilty in u.s. court
